404.title: Sorry, we can't find that page
404.subtext: Hit the button below to view our sitemap.

location_popup.title: Select location
location_popup.excluded_states_html:
We have different websites which serve different regions. Please click through to the relevant site if you can't find your country:
- UK site
- Europe site
- Rest of World site - if you are in Alaska or Hawaii, please use this site

delivery_page.no_results_html:
Sorry, we cannot find your location. Please check the spelling or click the flag icon at the top of the page to switch between our UK, Europe and Rest of World websites.

We are currently unable to deliver to some locations due to Covid-19 restrictions. We will restore all affected countries to our site as soon as possible. There is also a handful of countries which we are unable to ship to due to customs limitations – you can see the list of these on our FAQ page.

magsafe.question_expanded_text: The above filter will show our fully MagSafe compatible cases and accessories. Limitless 3.0 and Clarity iPhone 12 cases are usable with the MagSafe Charger but not accessories.

checkout.shipping_delay_message_us: The below transit times are our delivery aims, but please note that Covid-19 is still having an ongoing impact on the speed of some international deliveries. US orders are dispatching as normal.
checkout.shipping_delay_message_row: The below transit times are our delivery aims, but please note that Covid-19 is still having an ongoing impact on the speed of some international deliveries.
checkout.shipping_delay_message_eu_generic: SHIPPING UPDATES: All duties and taxes are included in the price. Standard shipping services are experiencing some delays into the EU.
checkout.shipping_delay_message_eu_delayed: SHIPPING UPDATES: All duties and taxes are included in the price. Standard shipping services are experiencing some delays into the EU.
checkout.dispatch_message_uk: Tracked Postal Service orders will be dispatched within 2 working days. Orders containing a pre-order item will be dispatched from the date stated at cart. Due to courier limitations, we cannot currently offer next day delivery to The Highlands, Isle of Man, Channel and Scilly Isles.
checkout.dispatch_message_us: Standard orders will be dispatched within 2 business days, Express orders will be dispatched within 1 business day. Orders containing a pre-order item will be dispatched from the date stated at cart.
checkout.dispatch_message_eu: Tracked Postal Service orders will be dispatched within 2 working days. DHL Express orders will be dispatched within 1 working day. Orders containing a pre-order item will be dispatched from the date stated at cart.
checkout.dispatch_message_row: Tracked Postal Service orders will be dispatched within 2 working days. DHL Express orders will be dispatched within 1 working day. Orders containing a pre-order item will be dispatched from the date stated at cart.
checkout.invalid_discount_code_message: Sorry, this code has expired, but here's a treat from us. Use code 10EXTRA to get 10% off.

thank_you.company_tracking_number: Tracking number (click here to track your order):

confirmation.compatibility_title: You have ordered products compatible with:
confirmation.delivery_address_title: Your order will be shipped to:
confirmation.something_wrong_text: If the order information is incorrect please click the button above to let us know ASAP.
confirmation.existing_cust_discount: Use code [BUYAGAIN] to get 20% off your next order. Be quick, it's only valid for 7 days!

options.seven: Someone I follow on Social Media

checkout.express_checkout_redirect_text: You will be redirected to your chosen secure checkout where you can complete your payment.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: This order can't be shipped to your location. If you are in mainland USA please visit www.mous.co to place your order. Contact us for more information.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Some items in your cart don't ship to your location. If you are in mainland USA please visit www.mous.co to place your order. Contact us for more information.

shipping_method_not_available_updated.one: The item you added doesn't ship to your location. Remove it to check out, or contact us. If you are in mainland USA please visit www.mous.co to place your order.
shipping_method_not_available_updated.other: One or more items you added don't ship to your location. Remove them to check out, or contact us. If you are in mainland USA please visit www.mous.co to place your order.
